name: The Second Fridge
description:
You are a space marine aboard the USG Stone Village. You have successfully completed a planet survey mission and are now on your way back home.

To celebrate the deed, the captain has ordered you to fetch a delicious Bolturnian lobster stored in the backup fridge, located at the bottom of an abandoned part of the ship.

Just grab the perfectly preserved food and come back in time for the celebration!

Controls

Use mouse to aim
Hold space to charge jump and release to jump
Escape to quit
